entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:08 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: W 24 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
